, USMC ( Ret ) : first woman to be promoted to Lieutenant General ( 1 September 1996 ) Claudia J. Kennedy , LTG , USA ( Ret ) : first woman to be promoted to Lieutenant General in the United States Army ( 17 June 1997 ) Ricardo Sanchez , LTG , USA ( Ret ) : former commander U.S. V Corps , former commander of US ground forces in Iraq

William Eldridge Odom , head of
the National Security Agency under president Ronald Reagan , outspoken opponent of the Iraq War and warrantless wiretaping of US citizens . Carol A. Mutter , LtGen , USMC ( Ret ) : first woman to be promoted to Lieutenant General ( 1 September 1996 ) Claudia J. Kennedy , LTG , USA ( Ret ) : first woman to be promoted to Lieutenant General in the United States Army ( 17 June 1997 )
